extendedInfo.description: *Download now at the special NSO price!*Treat brings the traditional student discount card to your phone for increased convenience and even greater savings! With Treat you'll save 10% or more at over 15 great restaurants! Make back your money within weeks (or even days!) of downloading and then continue to enjoy great savings all year long.Â Partners Include: City Tap House, Copabanana, Allegro, Metropolitan Bakery, Pizza Rustica, Rumor, Sound Garden, Axis Pizza, Scoop Deville, Subway (46th and Baltimore), Farmacy RX, 500 Degrees, Burger.Org, New Harmony Vegetarian, Square on Square, and more!
